Title: 16. Lady Gaga The Mayhem Ball tour
Description: 18th, 19th, 21st & 24th May  Image credit: @ladygaga via Instagram Good news for Singaporean Little Monsters! Lady Gaga is finally coming back after 13 years for 4 huge concerts at the National Stadium with her Mayhem Ball tour . It’s been a while since her Born This Way Ball Tour in 2012, and she’s just dropped a new album called MAYHEM. Sounds like she’s going back to her pop sound, so expect something bold and personal, with tracks like Perfect Celebrity and Vanish Into You . Tickets: From $148 Venue: National Stadium Dates: 18th, 19th, 21st & 24th May Time: 8pm Get tickets for Lady Gaga in Singapore .
